directory.name: Access Bank PLC
directory.description: Access Bank is a leading full-service commercial bank, that has continued its impressive growth trend, both organically and by acquisition, and quickly became one of Nigeria’s leading corporate banks with a reputation for strong compliance, risk management and trade finance.

directory.name: Boston Consulting Group
directory.address: 2 Olumegbon Road, Off Alfred Rewane (Kingsway) Road, Ikoyi, Lagos State.
directory.description: Boston Consulting Group is a global consulting firm that partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities.

directory.name: Custodian Investment PLC
directory.address: Custodian House, 16A, Commercial Avenue, Sabo, Yaba, Lagos.
directory.description: Custodian Investment Plc. is a leading Nigerian Investment Group with operations in the Other Financial Services Sector of the economy. The company remains committed to continuous improvement of its businesses, structures, systems and processes in order to keep ahead of the challenges of new growth, improving business prospects, transparency, and governance.

directory.name: Alaro City
directory.address: 3rd Floor 100 Pier Point, Ajose Adeogun, Victoria Island, Lagos.
directory.description: Alaro City is an integrated, mixed-use city planned on over 2,000 hectares in the Lekki Free Zone. Alaro City has and continues to attract industrial powerhouses who have moved their businesses in order to benefit maximally from the Free Zone regime.

directory.name: First Bank Plc
directory.description: First Bank Plc is the foremost financial institution offering general banking and money transfer services

directory.name: Julius Berger
directory.description: Julius Berger is a leading Nigerian company offering integrated construction solutions and related services. They specialize in executing complex works that require the highest levels of technical expertise and excel in the implementation of state-of-the-art construction methods and technologies.

directory.name: Mixta Africa
directory.address: 8 Kasumu Ekemode St, Victoria Island 106104, Lagos
directory.description: Mixta Africa founded in 2005 is, committed to the provision of modern urban infrastructure and affordable housing solutions on the country and its commitment plays a substantial role in the growth and development of the local economies. Mixta’s approach to social responsibility combines helping them to give back to their communities and executing their projects with environmental sustainability in mind.

directory.name: Standard Chartered
directory.description: The Bank offers a wide range of products and services in Retail; Wealth Management; Commercial; Corporate and Institutional; Private, Digital and Transaction Banking business.

directory.name: Shell PLC.
directory.address: Shell Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria Ltd, Freeman House, 21/22 Marina, PMB 2418, Lagos, Nigeria
directory.description: Shell is Nigeria’s oldest energy company, and has a long term and continuing commitment to the country, its people and the economy. Shell is an integrated energy company that aims to meet the world’s growing demand for energy in ways that are economically, environmentally and socially responsible.
